data.message: #facebook Im locked out of my old page and I dont remembet the old password to my email how can I get my old page back pleeeease help me

replies.message: Hi there, Starlet. Have you tried following these tips to get back into your account? Learn more:  http://on.fb.me/1Ko67ZJ. -Nancy
Hi Facebook. I don't get the 3 trusted contact option to get back to my account. The email provider doesn't recognize the email associated with account. I don't have the phone number either .
I have read all the self-help services on Facebook , none of them has helped.

I never thought there were a limited attempts for the 3 trusted contacts options. I was trying to chose friends nearby ( to use local calls) but the options were friends living overseas ( expensive international calls and they might have changed there numbers )
Please Facebook help me log back into my account.
Los de facebook estan locos prinsipalmente los de california si tanto es como mo desaparesen definitivamente  lo que es ami ni me interesa
Me to same problem but I started a new page with the number I have now it recognize my new page with the number
